titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation touching the surueying of the seacoales of Newcastle, Sunderland, and Blythe.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Newmarket the sixteenth day of February, in the two and twentieth yeere of our reigne ..
Imprint from colophon; the publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 14; Steele notation: Sun- haue 2) Petition 3) extraor- 4) vnmer- 5) of to.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
